channel.title: Ronald Reagan on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Ronald Reagan on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Jimmy Hunt, Young Star of ‘Invaders From Mars,’ Dies at 85
item.description: From 1945-53, he appeared in 35 films, and his onscreen parents included Dick Powell, Teresa Wright, Ronald Reagan, Patricia Neal, Leif Erickson and Claudette Colbert.
